# Lay Low
## Overview
*Lay Low (Ex):* Other creatures add +5 to the DC of [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] and [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local) skill checks to gather information or learn of you, your activities, or your recent exploits or goals. 

**Source:** Class Acts: Rogues (Abandoned Arts), pg. 2
